name: Cornell Pro-Yos
desc: I was a member of a Chinese Yoyo performance group known as the Pro-Yos!
We performed at several events each semester, culminating in a big showcase performance at the end of the spring semester.
I also served as the club’s secretary for one semester.

name: Engineering Ambassadors
desc: I was part of Cornell’s Engineering Ambassadors, where I was responsible for giving tours for prospective and newly admitted students to the college of engineering as well as hosting Q&A sessions.
I also contributed to the college’s virtual visit website for prospective students by writing blog posts and other written media.

name: ACSU
desc: I am a general member of the Association of Computer Science Undergraduates (ACSU).
I’m mostly involved with the group’s mentorship program, where I provided guidance to underclassmen in the CS major and offered advice to those considering a CS major.
